p.b: Dynamic Tag Management & Adobe Target Integration Update

conbody.p: On October 16th Dynamic Tag Management will release an update to the Adobe Target tool integration. The updated tool will include the following features:

ol.li: ·Adobe Target account synchronization: The updated integration allows for automatic syncing of your Adobe Target account and mbox.js code via Marketing Cloud or the inclusion of the specific Target account Client Code. Once the accounts are connected, Dynamic Tag Management will pull the Adobe Target mbox.js code into the tool with the goal of optimizing the configuration process and increasing consistency between the two solutions.

·Adobe managed mbox.js code configuration option: The updated integration continues to allow users to manually manage and customize their mbox.js code from within DTM, but will now also offer a "Managed by Adobe" option that will load the mbox.js code directly from Adobe. This update will optimize the configuration process when using a manual method as no more copy / pasting from the Adobe Target admin console is required.

·Global Parameter Configuration Options: The updated integration allows for the configuration of global parameters to pass additional data to the global Target Mbox via the Target tool settings and also on a per page basis via page load rules. The parameters configured in DTM will not override any parameters already defined on the page, but instead will append and sequence in order to create maximum flexibility and customization on a per page basis.
